name: tsgo-gql-tada-union-perf
description: Minimal repro for tsgo slowdown on gql.tada union-heavy typing

scripts.schema:generate: tsx ./scripts/genSchema.ts && npm run types:generate && npm run scenario:generate
scripts.bench:once:tsc: npm run lint:clear && npm run lint:tsc
scripts.bench:once:tsgo: npm run lint:clear && npm run lint:tsgo
scripts.bench:once:tsgo:single-threaded: npm run lint:clear && npm run lint:tsgo:single-threaded
scripts.bench:once:tsgo:checkers: npm run lint:clear && npm run lint:tsgo:checkers
scripts.bench:scenario:once:tsc: npm run scenario:generate && npm run bench:once:tsc
scripts.bench:scenario:once:tsgo: npm run scenario:generate && npm run bench:once:tsgo
scripts.bench:scenario:once:tsgo:single-threaded: npm run scenario:generate && npm run bench:once:tsgo:single-threaded
scripts.bench:scenario:loop: npm run scenario:generate && npm run bench:loop
scripts.verify:toolchain: tsc --version && tsgo --help > /dev/null && tsgo --singleThreaded --help > /dev/null && echo "tsgo single-threaded flag is available"
